snippet: The Bell and Anchor in Sag Harbor, which opened in May, may be this season’s hottest Hamptons restaurant, offering expansive water views in a crisp, clean setting.
abstract: Joanne Starkey reviews The Bell and Anchor, seafood restaurant in Sag Harbor, NY (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The Bell and Anchor in Sag Harbor, which opened in May, may be this season’s hottest Hamptons restaurant, offering expansive water views in a crisp, clean setting.

headline.seo: A Review of the Bell and Anchor, in Sag Harbor
headline.main: Seafood and Service That Draw a Crowd
